summary: This is a congratulatory email sent to an FBI Victim Specialist in New York on June 23, 2022, referencing the recipient's work on an Epstein case and jokingly suggesting they need another such case to achieve a promotion to grade one detective.
keyFacts: An FBI Victim Specialist in New York received a congratulatory email in June 2022 related to their work on an Epstein case.
The email suggests the recipient's work on the Epstein case contributed to a professional achievement.
The email contains an informal, joking reference to needing 'another Epstein case' to achieve a promotion to 'grade one detective'.
